subtitle: A really tasty soup that's so easy to make.

method.text: Heat the butter or margarine. Add the onions. Cook gently for 5-6 min, stirring well, without colouring.
Add the flour. Stir well. Cook for 1 min. Gradually blend in the stock and milk. Bring to the boil. Cook for 10 min until onions are very tender and soup has thickened slightly.
Add the carrots. Cook for 2-3 min only, so the carrots keep both texture and colour.
Stir the cheese, seasoning and mustard into the soup. Gently heat through for 2-3 min.

title: Stilton soup
